Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Relates to free use of state parks and campsites for volunteer firefighters and members of a volunteer ambulance service
Summary: Provides free use of state parks and campsites for volunteer firefighters and members of a volunteer ambulance service.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง13.19, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to providing free use of state parks for volunteer firefighters and volunteer ambulance personnel
